name: Two words in a line are separated by one space
instruction:
We need to determine that there is only one space between two words in the string.

Write a function `isOneSpace` that takes a string and returns `true` if there is only one space between two words in the string.

The function always passes a string that has two words separated by a space or several spaces.

Examples:
```javascript
isOneSpace('a b'); // true
isOneSpace('a b'); // false
isOneSpace('a b'); // false
isOneSpace('a b'); // false

isOneSpace('hello world'); // true
isOneSpace('hello world'); // false
```
